item.title: About me
item.description: Alessandro Baffa Software Engineer, strong advocate of clean code, testing, quality, continuous learning and continuous improvement. If you are curious to see what I am working on and what I am learning at the moment, check out my projects on Github. I love to organize learning activities and helping others to improve their skills. I am also good at motivating people. I am a proactive and energetic person. I am a photography enthusiast –> Flickr.
